message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to let it go for $120.
Thanks for the offer Alice, but $120 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $105 for the product. What do you think?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. However, I've got to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer it to you for $115.
Alice, I appreciate you coming down a bit, but $115 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to go up to $110. Let's see if we can make this work.
I'm glad we're close, Bob. I can see you're really interested in the product. I'm willing to make one more concession, so I'll offer it to you for $112.50. That's the lowest I can go.
